Title: SARAH - Smart Artificial Robotics Assistant Hub
Description: SARAH is Smart Artificial Robotics Assistant Hub. It communicate with the user in human-like style, and control hardware through verbal command.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SARAH is Smart Artificial Robotics Assistant Hub. It communicate with the user in human-like style, and control hardware through verbal command.
S.A.R.A.H. stands for Smart Artificial Robotics Assistant Hub.

Aims
The aims of this project is to create a virtual assistant to help use to complete their daily tasks.

Objectives
  • Develop the core system of SARAH
  • Make SARAH able to access and control other hardware
  • Communicate between different instance of SARAH on different platform

Features

<2016.05.03> Designing project framework
